title: Apple reports record-breaking Q1 2026 earnings: $143.7 billion in revenue, up 16%
full_text: Apple reports record-breaking Q1 2026 earnings: $143.7 billion in revenue, up 16%. Apple just had its biggest fiscal quarter ever, delivering on the promise it made last October during the Q4 2025 earnings call. In the quarter ended December 27, 2025, the company reported $143.7 billion in revenue, $42.09 in net profit, and $2.84 in earn…. Apple just had its biggest fiscal quarter ever, delivering on the promise it made last October during the Q4 2025 earnings call.
